Quote from GM Cyraex:

Hello Paladins of Elanthia!

I know you are all eagerly awaiting the release of Divine Incarnation (1650), so I thought I'd give you all a little quality of life improvement to hold you over until release day. As a result, I've updated Aura of Arkati (1614) to include a new single target version of the spell at a cost of 7 mana. In addition, you can now infuse 1614 into your bonded weapon provided that you have the appropriate training to do so. Please let me know if you see any issues or if you have any questions or concerns. Enjoy!

GameMaster Cyraex
